title: Beauty products containing Alcohol - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: ACK jebin sent us an email saying that is it permissible for a Muslim to use perfume soaps and moisturizing cream containing alcohol now the question is specific the ruling of the existence of alcohol in such things and substances she's not asking about the ruling on going out for a female wearing perfume this is a different issue so to answer your questions you mean the answer is this is totally permissible there is nothing wrong in sha Allah in wearing moisturizers with alcohol in it were perfumes the other aunts make up whatever alcohol does not affect your your purity you can pray with the substance on your body without any
